tasks.label: build:all
tasks.command: echo 'Building all...' && sleep 2 && echo 'Build complete!'

tasks.label: build:production
tasks.command: echo 'Building production bundle...' && sleep 3 && echo 'Production build complete!'

tasks.label: build:watch
tasks.command: echo 'Starting watch mode...' && while true; do echo 'Watching for changes...'; sleep 5; done

tasks.label: build:clean
tasks.command: echo 'Cleaning build directories...' && sleep 1 && echo 'Clean complete!'

tasks.label: test:all
tasks.command: echo 'Running all tests...' && sleep 3 && echo '✓ All tests passed!'

tasks.label: test:unit
tasks.command: echo 'Running unit tests...' && sleep 2 && echo '✓ Unit tests passed!'

tasks.label: test:integration
tasks.command: echo 'Running integration tests...' && sleep 4 && echo '✓ Integration tests passed!'

tasks.label: test:coverage
tasks.command: echo 'Running tests with coverage...' && sleep 3 && echo '✓ Coverage: 87%'

tasks.label: test:staging
tasks.command: echo 'Running staging tests...' && sleep 3 && echo '✓ Staging tests passed!'

tasks.label: test:smoke
tasks.command: echo 'Running smoke tests...' && sleep 2 && echo '✓ Smoke tests passed!'

tasks.label: dev:start
tasks.command: echo 'Starting development server...' && echo 'Server running at http://localhost:3000' && while true; do sleep 10; done

tasks.label: lint:check
tasks.command: echo 'Checking code style...' && sleep 2 && echo '✓ No linting errors found!'

tasks.label: lint:fix
tasks.command: echo 'Fixing code style issues...' && sleep 2 && echo '✓ Fixed 3 issues!'

tasks.label: typescript:check
tasks.command: echo 'Type checking...' && sleep 2 && echo '✓ No type errors found!'

tasks.label: db:migrate
tasks.command: echo 'Running database migrations...' && sleep 2 && echo '✓ Migrations complete!'

tasks.label: db:seed
tasks.command: echo 'Seeding database...' && sleep 3 && echo '✓ Database seeded successfully!'

tasks.label: db:reset
tasks.command: echo 'Resetting database...' && sleep 3 && echo '✓ Database reset complete!'

tasks.label: docker:build
tasks.command: echo 'Building Docker images...' && sleep 4 && echo '✓ Docker build complete!'

tasks.label: docker:up
tasks.command: echo 'Starting Docker containers...' && echo '✓ Containers running' && while true; do sleep 10; done

tasks.label: docker:down
tasks.command: echo 'Stopping Docker containers...' && sleep 2 && echo '✓ Containers stopped!'

tasks.label: deploy:staging
tasks.command: echo 'Deploying to staging...' && sleep 5 && echo '✓ Deployed to staging successfully!'

tasks.label: deploy:production
tasks.command: echo '⚠️  Deploying to PRODUCTION...' && sleep 5 && echo '✓ Deployed to production successfully!'

tasks.label: deploy:rollback
tasks.command: echo 'Rolling back deployment...' && sleep 3 && echo '✓ Rollback complete!'

tasks.label: security:audit
tasks.command: echo 'Running security audit...' && sleep 3 && echo '✓ No vulnerabilities found!'

tasks.label: version:bump
tasks.command: echo 'Bumping version...' && sleep 1 && echo '✓ Version updated to 1.0.1'

tasks.label: logs:production
tasks.command: echo 'Streaming production logs...' && while true; do echo '[$(date)] Production log entry'; sleep 3; done

tasks.label: metrics:dashboard
tasks.command: echo 'Opening metrics dashboard...' && sleep 1 && echo '✓ Dashboard available at http://localhost:9090'

tasks.label: health:check
tasks.command: echo 'Checking service health...' && sleep 1 && echo '✓ Service is healthy!'

tasks.label: infra:plan
tasks.command: echo 'Planning infrastructure changes...' && sleep 3 && echo '✓ Plan complete - 2 resources to add'

tasks.label: infra:apply
tasks.command: echo 'Applying infrastructure changes...' && sleep 5 && echo '✓ Infrastructure updated successfully!'

tasks.label: ci:validate
tasks.command: echo 'Validating CI configuration...' && sleep 2 && echo '✓ CI configuration is valid!'
